Pre-Game Insights: Aqib Ilyas named as the new captain for the ICC T20 World Cup 2024
Zeeshan Maqsood joining the team along with batting all-rounder Mohammed Nadeem
Miscellaneous Highlights: This will be Oman's third appearance in the T20 World Cup
Oman could emerge as the dark horses of the groups who could end up giving a tough fight to the well-established opponents
Others: Oman is pooled in Group B alongside defending champions England and former winners Australia
Namibia and Scotland are the other members of the group
